name: Dominó Cubano Playspace
description:
Cuban Dominoes by Playspace is an online multiplayer game where you can chat with your friends while you challenge them or one of the other thousands of players who make up our community.

Be the best Cuban Dominoes online player!

FEATURES Cuban Dominoes by Playspace

- It’s free to play!
- Chat and play with your friends.
- Become the best Cuban Dominoes player in our ranking.
- Play special games: in pairs, turbo and private.
- Get double coins when you win your games with the "Double or Nothing"
- Unlock achievements and progress through the game getting gifts and coins.

Follow us on Facebook http://goo.gl/qXIggC and Twitter https://twitter.com/playspace?lang=es to know more about the games of Playspace and contact us.

If you have any problem we will help you solve it and you can recommend us how we can improve our games https://www.facebook.com/playspace/?ref=ts&fref=ts

Remember, you will need to be connect to play.

Terms and Conditions: http://goo.gl/u30FLZ

Enjoy the best free Cuban Dominoes online in Playspace!

Visit our blog http://blog.playspace.com/

Thank you,
The Playspace Team.
